changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on tracking/telemetry improvements for the Adjust Daily Calories feature, reactivation flow enhancements including Free Cut Pop Up integration, and cart service migration work. Multiple bug fixes address UI issues, test failures, and React Suspense problems, while voucher handling was updated to support new OTP patterns.

features.name: Adjust Daily Calories Tracking
features.description: Added comprehensive tracking and tracing for the Adjust Daily Calories feature including NumberStepper interactions, Continue CTA clicks, confirmation events, and span instrumentation

features.name: Free Cut Pop Up in Reactivation
features.description: Integrated MSS (meal selection service) with free cut pop up in reactivation flow for MR brand, including copy updates and previously selected add-on display

features.name: OTP Voucher Pattern Support
features.description: Updated voucher input to accept MR-OTPX pattern and adapted first box page redirection logic for OTP skus

features.name: Info Banner on Reactivation Page
features.description: Integrated info banner component on the reactivation page for GD (presumably a brand/region)

features.name: Minimal Logo Header for Checkout Confirmation
features.description: Created minimal logo header specifically for checkout confirmation page

decisions.rationale: Addressing PrivateSymbol.getProxyInternalField errors in cart and other stability issues

decisions.what: Hide voucher input on Plans page
decisions.rationale: Part of OTP pattern implementation changes
Test causing issues, skipped temporarily while being addressed

refactors.reason: Migration to new cart service architecture
refactors.impact: Removed deprecated references to old stored SKU hook

refactors.reason: Improve user experience by preventing invalid states
refactors.impact: Added redirects when plan or meal selection are invalid

fixes.issue: UI fixes for Adjust Daily Calories post-testing

entities.name: Adjust Daily Calories
entities.context: Enhanced with tracking, tracing, UI fixes, and telemetry instrumentation

entities.name: Reactivation Flow
entities.context: Multiple enhancements including Free Cut Pop Up, info banner, and test coverage additions

entities.name: Cart Service
entities.context: Undergoing migration for Factor Form, removing deprecated hooks

entities.name: MR (Brand)
entities.context: Receiving Free Cut Pop Up integration and OTP voucher pattern support

entities.name: GD (Brand/Region)
entities.context: Getting info banner component on reactivation page

entities.name: MSS (Meal Selection Service)
entities.context: Integrated with Free Cut Pop Up in reactivation

entities.name: Checkout Confirmation Page
entities.context: Received new minimal logo header design

key_patterns: Extensive use of observability/tracing with span instrumentation for feature tracking
Feature flag or brand-specific implementations (MR, GD) suggesting multi-tenant architecture
Iterative development with post-testing fixes and incremental feature rollouts
Service migration pattern with gradual deprecation of old hooks/APIs
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (TPT, GOC, RTEVMS prefixes)
React Suspense experimentation with enable/disable toggles suggesting cautious rollout
Validation and redirect patterns to prevent invalid user states
